name: Jumbl: Word Puzzle Challenge
description:
Jumbl is an addictive word puzzle game. Keep swapping letters until you uncover all of the hidden words on the board.

Test your word skills and spot patterns to crack the levels. The puzzles get harder as the game progresses and you only have a limited number of swaps to use.

With endless puzzles, once you start playing Jumbl, you’re going to find it hard to put down.
